overview:
Niall O’Driscoll is responsible for marketing communications, product management, and the user experience of Axentra products. Niall has over twelve years of experience in product marketing and project management in software, interactive and stock media, and online financial services.

Prior to joining Axentra, Niall held various product management positions at Neteller, Getty Images and Adobe Systems (Adobe Studios Division). Niall was also Vice President of Content at Hemera Technologies, a consumer imaging software and stock media company. Niall holds a Bachelor’s degree in Communications from the University of Calgary and is a Pragmatic Marketing certified practitioner.
